# description

**Instance Property**

A list of parental controls that are turned on, for debugging purposes.

## Declaration

```swift
var description: String { get }
```

## Discussion

Returns a comma separated list of the parental control options that are currently turned on.

## Accessing the raw value

- **rawValue**: The raw value of the option set.

items.description: The raw value of the option set.
items.name: rawValue

title: description
